name(Belt of Orion)
snap(-99,-62,-48)

sky(19,16,25)
fog(24,17,23)
ground(200,202,192)
snow()
fadefrom(5600)
lightson()
nlaps(3)


set(10,0,0,250,0)p
set(10,0,5600,250,0)p
chk(48,0,10000,250,0)
set(10,0,11200,250,0)p
set(30,0,16800,250,0)p
set(45,0,21250,250,0)p
set(46,0,25450,250,0)pr

set(65,-53200,21250,250,0)p
set(143,-53200,15650,250,180)p

set(141,-53200,11450,250,-90)p
